abstract: It would take eight months and many hours of meetings and research for me to figure out how I was being charged and what I could do about it.
snippet: It would take eight months and many hours of meetings and research for me to figure out how I was being charged and what I could do about it.
lead_paragraph: I have been accepting credit cards at my business for many years. My recollection is that I first signed up to take them in 1994. During most of that time, I have used my regular business bank, PNC, to process the transactions. When I signed up for PNC’s merchant-processing services, I knew that I would be paying fees for the services, but I was wrapped up in other business issues at the time and paid little attention to the details.

headline.main: My Search for Reasonable and Understandable Credit Card Processing
